title: Lost Property shop

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Lost Property shop is an item retrieval service run by Perdu. Players are able to retrieve certain items that might have been lost for a fee. The fee is generally higher than what would be paid if the player retrieved the item in its traditional manner.

The Lost Property shop is an item retrieval service run by Perdu. Players are able to retrieve certain items that might have been lost for a fee. The fee is generally higher than what would be paid if the player retrieved the item in its traditional manner.

Perdu's Lost Property shop.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Perdu, who runs the shop, can be found in the following locations:

  • Lumbridge - Castle courtyard.
  • Catherby - In the house just north of the bank.
  • Edgeville - 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the general store (inside the bank on PvP and BH worlds).
  • Falador - 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the general store.
  • Ferox Enclave - by the bank chest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 March 2016
(update)

Perdu will now give multiple copies of achievement diary reward gear pieces if you pay the fee each time.

16 July 2015
(update | poll)

Perdu, the dwarf found upstairs in Edgeville general store, will now sell you back any achievement diary gear that you may have lost.

11 July 2013
(update | poll)

Perdu, a travelling dwarven merchant, can now be found in Lumbridge, Falador, Catherby and Edgeville. He will return certain reward items to you if he thinks you've lost them, although his prices are higher than you'd have paid elsewhere.
